title: A Parrish Affair
description: Ciara Parrish had it all. A handsome adoring husband who did everything for her. A charmed live in a country manor in the rural townland of Ballyfauna, Ireland. Life was good and Ciara was happy - or at least she thought she was! That was until Ciara took on a new job and not long after, a new boss - the very attractive Fr David Magee.  Very different to his predecessor, Davidâ€™s unconventional approach to working with Ciara leaves her hot and bothered and her flirting, has not gone unnoticed. Bill, her devoted but often controlling husband becomes jealous with the amount of attention Ciara is giving to her work with Fr Magee and the endless chats over the phone even when Ciara is off duty! Determined to put an end to the cosy friendship that seems to be developing, Bill spreads a rumour so vicious that events soon spiral out of control. Can Ciara ever forgive Bill and will she ever be happy again? BUY NOW
author: Tessa Daly
